Class Dealer

java.lang.Object
Player
Dealer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Scoreboard
public class Dealer extends Player implements Cloneable, Serializable
The dealer class is responsible for handling dealer specific function while still being able to perform those of a player.
Author:
gunnarvonbergen

  • Constructor Details

    • Dealer

      public Dealer(String NAME, int wins, int losses, int blackjacks)
      Creates a new Dealer object with the given name, wins, losses, and blackjacks. Calls on the constructor of the Player class to initialize instance variables.
      Parameters:
      NAME - the name of the dealer
      wins - the number of wins the dealer has
      losses - the number of losses the dealer has
      blackjacks - the number of blackjacks the dealer has

    • Dealer

      public Dealer(Dealer other)
      Copy constructor for creating a deep copy of a dealer object.
      Parameters:
      other - the dealer object to copy from.

  • Method Details

    • playHand

      public void playHand(Deck deck, Player player)
      Plays a dealers hand against a player.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck being used to hold the current cards.
      player - the player being played against.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Deck deck)
      Draws a card from the passed deck's array list of cards.
      Overrides:
      drawCard in class Player
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck containg the cards to be drawn from.

    • displayHand

      public void displayHand()
      Loops through all cards a dealer has in their hand and displays each card.

    • setFirstCardDealt

      public void setFirstCardDealt(boolean value)
      Sets the status of whether or not the dealer has already been dealt a card.
      Parameters:
      value - true if the first card has been dealt.

    • getGamesDealt

      public int getGamesDealt()
      The number of games the dealer has dealt.
      Returns:
      the number of games the dealer has dealt as an integer.

    • clone

      public Dealer clone()
      Calls on the copy constructor to create a deep copy of a dealer object.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Player
      Returns:
      a new Player object that deep copies all attributes.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a way to easily print the dealer's simple stats. DisplayStats() in the parent player class is also available for detailed stats.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Player
      See Also:
      • for a detailed player description.
